description: From Latin spadō, from Ancient Greek.

nouns.description: spado (plural spados or spadoes or spadones)

entries.meaning: (now rare) Someone who has been castrated; a eunuch or castrato.
examples: an impotency, or total privation thereof, prolongeth life; and they live longest in every kind that exercise it not at all. And this is true, not only in eunuchs by nature, but spadoes by art  […]
